key_risk_themes: ["Frontend Performance at Scale","Real-time Feature Complexity","Security of Authentication Flows"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Establish a firm API-first contract with the backend team and implement mock servers (MSW) to de-risk timeline dependencies.","Implement automated accessibility testing (Axe) into the CI pipeline immediately to prevent accumulation of accessibility debt.","Conduct a mandatory security review of the planned token refresh and storage mechanism before implementation begins."]
